DOC.detailed_description: The study compare effectiveness The Monarch™ System The Vest® Airway Clearance System . All subject receive treatment system endpoint compare .
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) ( sweat test and/or genetics ) Age ≥ 15 year Ability expectorate sputum daily determine treat physician Patient must stable regimen CF medication 4 week Patient require regular home airway clearance therapy Forced Expiratory Volume 1 Second ( FEV1 ) < 30 % predict > 90 % predict Anticipated requirement hospitalization within next three week History pneumothorax within past 6 month prior History haemoptysis require embolization within past 12 month Inability perform Monarch™ and/or Vest® System therapy direct Unable unwilling complete study visit provide followup data require per study protocol Has take Intravenous ( IV ) antibiotic within past 4 week prior Visit 1 Has ongoing exacerbation Allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis ( ABPA ) Pregnant lactate female
